explanation: [0-0] In a room, a man dressed in black sits on a chair with his back to the camera, holding a brown puppy. Behind him, a hand holds a toy gun, aiming at the man.

[0-5] The woman holding the toy gun pulls the trigger, but the gun malfunctions. She quickly hides the toy gun behind her back as the man turns to glance at her before turning back. The woman waves her hand behind her back, signaling a white puppy, which quickly gets up.
